product_name: eGear Pico Lite Night Vision Light - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The ultra-compact eGear Pico Lite Night Vision Light provides a powerful light source in a small, durable package. Powerful, 10-lumen LED light shines up to 30 ft. Rugged anodized aluminum body is water-resistant to IPX 4 standards (stands up to splashes). Rotating bezel switch helps prevent light from being turned on inadvertently; bezel is knurled for a good grip. Mini carabiner clip and split ring make it easy to attach the eGear PICO LED Zipper Lite just about anywhere. The eGear Pico Lite Night Vision Light runs on 4 LR-41 alkaline batteries (included). Closeout.
short_description: The ultra-compact eGear Pico Lite Night Vision Light provides a powerful light source in a small, durable package.
